channel.title: Contributing to It on Innovation Unboxed
channel.description: Recent content in Contributing to It on Innovation Unboxed

item.title: Why don't we talk about the contributions Disabled People have made to technology?
item.description: In recent decades, technology has been taking over the way we manage our day to day habits, the way we communicate with others or the way we reach information from newspapers, and all this without leaving our house. As the pace of change advances ever more rapidly, we wanted to explore how these technologies have reached the current point and the strong link these developments have in their origins as necessary responses and also the contributions made by Disabled People.
